parameter.value: I'm a ghost, apparently. You can see right through me, can't you?
The giants killed me. My body should be somwhere here.
Werewolves are scary creatures. They use very dark magic.
They're quite weak, but if you're not cautious, they'll give you a nice combo and you'll end up as me.
I can't offer you much. In fact, nothing. I don't own anything anymore. But maybe, some help is what I need. I could need you to fulfill a mission for me.
